issue.title: 0.4.0 release
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1014](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1014). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should target the next release around the week of May 29. We are accumulating some bug fixes and small improvements already, so we shouldn't delay in getting these out. We may want to push for some more integration tests and compatibility testing, so please attach JIRAs here to help with planning and priorities
